scripts.docker:dev: docker compose -f docker-files/docker-compose.yml -f docker-files/docker-compose.dev.yml -p calendar-app up -d --build
scripts.docker:prod: npm run prod:build && docker compose -f docker-files/docker-compose.yml -f docker-files/docker-compose.prod.yml -p calendar-app up -d --build
scripts.docker:dev:down: docker compose -f docker-files/docker-compose.yml -f docker-files/docker-compose.dev.yml -p calendar-app down
scripts.docker:prod:down: docker compose -f docker-files/docker-compose.yml -f docker-files/docker-compose.prod.yml -p calendar-app down
